group.comment: Module information and test Gateway communication.
group.label: CardGate information

field.label: CardGate testmode
field.comment: Switching between test and live mode.

field.label: Hash key
field.comment: The hash key as configured in the CardGate backoffice for the site.

field.label: Notifications recipient
field.comment: Receiver of all notification messages.

field.label: Order description
field.comment:
Payment description that will be shown to the customer in the gateway screen.
Variables: %id% = Order ID

field.label: Payment fees tax
field.comment: This sets whether CardGate Payment fees entered from Magento Admin include tax.

field.label: Tax Class for CardGate Payment fees
Return to checkout page on cancel
field.comment: Return to the default checkout page after cancellation of payment. By default the user returns to the cart.

field.label: Always show success page
field.comment: Always show the success page after returning from CardGate, even for non-successful payments.

field.label: Manually process order
field.comment: Manually processing orders allows for alterations to the order after a payment has been processed by CardGate.

field.label: Title
field.comment: Shown on the payment page.

field.label: Payment fee Fixed
field.comment: Fixed Payment fee amount. Can be used in conjunction with Payment fee Percentage.

field.label: Payment fee Percentage
field.comment: Payment fee percentage. Can be used in conjunction with Payment fee Fixed. Note: Fixed amount will be applied after percentage.

field.label: Payment method for specific customer groups
